etymology.description: Pictogram (象形): interpreted as a bent arm extending from the body, or as a wooden plough; original form 𠠲.
etymology.interpretation: Depicts an arm applying force, a concrete image that came to represent strength and effort. Some traditions also saw it as a plough, linking power with labor in the fields.

examples.chinese: 他力气很大(他力氣很大)。
我们要尽力完成任务(我們要盡力完成任務)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen yào jìn lì wánchéng rènwù.
examples.english: We must do our best to finish the task.

examples.chinese: 科技给人类带来巨大力量(科技給人類帶來巨大力量)。
examples.pinyin: Kējì gěi rénlèi dàilái jùdà lìliàng.
examples.english: Technology brings great power to humanity.
